raw_body: PARATHALINGAM – PADMA,​ Loving wife of the late Thiagalingam Parathalingam,​ beloved daughter of the late R. Doresamy and Nagamma Doresamy,​ darling mother of Sankarshana,​ Dakshana,​ Santali,​ Hiram,​ Aumanthi,​ Jaish and the late Ajita,​ mother-in-law of Anglica,​ Victor,​ Paru,​ Shankar and Adrian,​ darling grandmother of Anish,​ Amrisha,​ Nishkan,​ Aksha,​ Arati,​ Ganeshi,​ Sachin,​ Vikram,​ Tirupati,​ Anjum,​ Jaikishen and Aishi,​ darling great-grandmother of Maithri,​ Maheshi and Nelum. Cortege leaves residence at No. 5,​ Wijerama Mawatha,​ Colombo 07 on 7th February 2024 at 10.30 a.m. for Cremation at the General Cemetery,​ Borella (Hindu Section).008466
